meanings.definition: A type of inflatable mattress used for floating on water.
meanings.sent1: During the summer, we enjoy relaxing on our lilos in the pool.
meanings.sent2: The children played on their lilos at the beach all day.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally popped my lilo, so I had to swim back to shore.
meanings.sent4: Her lilo was like a fluffy cloud on the calm water.
meanings.sent5: The bright pink lilo stood out against the blue pool water.

meanings.definition: A type of flowering plant with large, trumpet-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with colorful lilos swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: She picked a beautiful lilo to put in a vase on the table.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the fragrant lilo in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The lilo in the park seemed to sing with the wind.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red lilo brightened up the entire yard.

meanings.definition: A type of small, edible fish commonly used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious dish using fresh lilos from the market.
meanings.sent2: The lilos were seasoned and grilled to perfection for dinner.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped the lilos on the floor while cooking.
meanings.sent4: The lilos in the stew added a burst of flavor to the meal.
meanings.sent5: The golden-brown lilos sizzled in the hot pan.
